scripts.test:unit: npm run build && node --experimental-test-isolation=none --test dist/**/*.test.js tests/unit/**/*.test.js
scripts.test:coverage:unit: npm run build && c8 --reporter=text --reporter=lcov --check-coverage --lines 100 --functions 100 --branches 100 --statements 100 node --experimental-test-isolation=none --test dist/**/*.test.js tests/unit/**/*.test.js
scripts.test:coverage:e2e: npm run build && c8 --reporter=text --reporter=lcov --check-coverage --lines 100 --functions 100 --branches 100 --statements 100 node --test tests/e2e/**/*.test.js
scripts.test:coverage:all-src: npm run build && c8 --all --src src --reporter=text --reporter=lcov --check-coverage --lines 100 --functions 100 --branches 100 --statements 100 node --experimental-test-isolation=none --test dist/**/*.test.js tests/unit/**/*.test.js tests/e2e/**/*.test.js
scripts.test:ci: npm run lint && npm run test:coverage
